title: Architect
description: Book 1An over the hill super solider. An obsolete android body guard and a software hacker come together in an attempt to set themselves free from their abusers. If only it could be that simple?Would it ever be respectable to have a Synthetic as a partner, an android created to be a companion, confidant, and lover? Would it be taboo, frowned upon? Could true love manifest its self?More than just a science fiction novel - a look at the possible future of relationships - fuelled by the advancement of technology and ultimately - true love.
author: Steven Stennett
